description: This file sets up a Weaviate vector database for recipe search, defines a knowledge base from a PDF URL, and implements an interactive agent that uses this knowledge base to respond to user input via command line prompts.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an interactive agent that can process user input and generate responses based on a knowledge base.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads data from a PDF URL and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search types, including hybrid search.

classes.name: Distance
classes.description: Enumeration for distance metrics used in vector similarity search.

classes.name: VectorIndex
classes.description: Enumeration for different vector index types, such as HNSW.

classes.name: Weaviate
classes.description: Class representing the Weaviate vector database interface.

methods.name: weaviate_agent
methods.description: Main function that initializes the agent and runs an interactive prompt loop for user queries.
